articles.lead: A variety of great design tools now exist, including Figma, Adobe XD, and Sketch with inVision. Mainly it's a matter of personal choice for the organization, as most are excellent. For refining aesthetics Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator are still king, but Affinity Photo and Designer are incredibly great additions.

I employ a practical and innovative design methodology for tackling web application issues. I follow the basic principles of user experience as described by UX pioneer Jakob Nielsen, including adherence to 10 usability heuristics.

Much development is now done with frameworks such as React, Angular, and Vue. My preference is to use React or React-like frameworks in conjunction with standards-based HTML5 and CSS3. I use REST or socket.io APIs to retreive data from back-end sources.
